Query.Sentence: SELECT htl_id,htl_name, htl_city, sum(bdc_slots) as htl_maximum_capacity FROM hotels LEFT JOIN rooms ON rm_htl_id = htl_id LEFT JOIN room_types rmt ON rmt_id = rm_rmt_id LEFT JOIN beds_combo ON bdc_id = rmt_bdc_id #WHERE# GROUP BY htl_id ORDER BY htl_id

SELECT htl_id, htl_name, htl_city,capacity_in_date_range, occupancy_in_date_range, ROUND(((CAST(occupancy_in_date_range AS NUMERIC)/CAST(capacity_in_date_range AS NUMERIC))*100),4) AS occupancy_percentage_in_date_range FROM (SELECT htl_id, htl_name, htl_city, sum(aux2.capacity) AS capacity_in_date_range, SUM(CASE WHEN aux2.ocupada= 'S' THEN aux2.capacity ELSE 0 END) AS occupancy_in_date_range FROM ( SELECT htl_id, htl_name,htl_city,aux.rm_id, aux.capacity, days.fecha,(case when (select count(*) from bookings where bkg_rm_id = aux.rm_id and bkg_canceled is null and days.fecha>= DATE(bkg_start) and days.fecha<=DATE(bkg_end))= 0 then 'N' else 'S' end) as ocupada FROM hotels LEFT JOIN (SELECT rm_htl_id, rm_id, sum(bdc_slots) AS capacity FROM rooms LEFT JOIN room_types rmt ON rmt_id = rm_rmt_id LEFT JOIN beds_combo ON bdc_id = rmt_bdc_id GROUP BY rm_id ORDER BY rm_id) AS aux ON aux.rm_htl_id = htl_id, (select fecha::date from #GEN_SERIES# fecha) days ) AS aux2 GROUP BY htl_id, htl_name,htl_city) AS aux3 ORDER BY occupancy_percentage_in_date_range DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT htl_id, htl_name, htl_city, sum(aux2.capacity) AS capacity_in_date_range FROM ( SELECT htl_id, htl_name, htl_city, aux.capacity, days.fecha,(case when (select count(*) from bookings where bkg_rm_id = aux.rm_id and bkg_canceled is null and days.fecha>= DATE(bkg_start) and days.fecha<=DATE(bkg_end) )= 0 then 'N' else 'S' end) as ocupada FROM hotels LEFT JOIN (SELECT rm_htl_id, rm_id, sum(bdc_slots) AS capacity FROM rooms LEFT JOIN room_types rmt ON rmt_id = rm_rmt_id LEFT JOIN beds_combo ON bdc_id = rmt_bdc_id GROUP BY rm_id ORDER BY rm_id) AS aux ON aux.rm_htl_id = htl_id, (select fecha from #GEN_SERIES# fecha) days ) AS aux2 GROUP BY htl_id, htl_name,htl_city ORDER BY htl_id

SELECT cst_cnt_iso, SUM(aux2.capacity) AS occupancy_in_date_range FROM (SELECT cst_cnt_iso, bkg_id, days.fecha, aux.capacity, (case when (bkg_canceled is null and days.fecha>= DATE(bkg_start) and days.fecha<=DATE(bkg_end))=false then 'N' else 'S' end) as ocupada FROM bookings JOIN customers ON bkg_cst_id = cst_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT rm_htl_id, rm_id, sum(bdc_slots) AS capacity FROM rooms LEFT JOIN room_types rmt ON rmt_id = rm_rmt_id LEFT JOIN beds_combo ON bdc_id = rmt_bdc_id #WHERE# GROUP BY rm_id ORDER BY rm_id) AS aux ON aux.rm_id = bkg_rm_id, (select fecha::date from #GEN_SERIES# fecha) days ORDER BY bkg_id,cst_cnt_iso) AS aux2 WHERE aux2.ocupada = 'S' GROUP BY cst_cnt_iso
